title: Chapter 1726 - The Curtains Fall
body:
Chapter 1726 - The Curtains Fall

Boom!

As the sword-bearing ape closed his grip, he ripped Coiled God Ridge right out of the ground. The nineteen killing formations covering the mountains crumbled into nothingness.

Tai Zheng, Xue Hongshan, and the other Immortal Kings shot through the air, fleeing like mad.

The ape, however, didn’t give chase. Instead, he gazed at Su Yi and said, “How about we just leave them to Huang Tuo?”

“Sure, but bring the one from the Endless Swords Immortal Sect back alive,” said Su Yi.

The Endless Swords Immortal Sect originally had three Immortal Kings, but Su Yi had just killed Liu Shuijing and Yu Wenqi. Only the third and final of their Immortal Kings, Tao Qian, still lived.

The sword-bearing ape just nodded and turned to Huang Tuo. “Get it over with quickly.”

“Got it!” The massive Huang Tuo promptly led the throng of strange life forms and got to work.

“Come on, let’s go to my place and have a drink,” the ape said with a laugh.

Su Yi said with exasperation, “Let me treat my wounds before we start drinking.”

The ape couldn’t help but chuckle. “Very well.”

The two of them promptly set off, venturing...
